calhs.title: California Health Services
text: Public access to non-confidential health and human services data.
The portal leverages the CKAN open data platform. APIs and other developer tools that can be found here: http://docs.ckan.org/en/latest/maintaining/datastore.html#the-datastore-api

intel.title: Intel AI DevCloud
text: A cloud hosted hardware and software platform available to developers, researchers and startups to learn, sandbox and get started on their Artificial Intelligence projects.
intel.prize: Best Use of DevCloud - 12 months DevCloud access + 4 drones

keysight.title: Keysight Hardware
text: Keysight is the world's leading electronic measurement company, transforming today's measurement experience through innovations in wireless, modular and software solutions.
Keysight is lending out hardware kits including RPi's with capacitive touch screens, sensors, and free swag.
keysight.prize: Best Hardware Hack - 4x Keysight Digital Multimeters

osisoft.title: OSISoft Pi Web API
text: The PI Web API is a RESTful interface to the PI System. It gives client applications read and write access to their AF and PI data over HTTPS.
OSISoft blog post about HackDavis: https://goo.gl/AnZDBz

genability.title: Genability
text: Resources for developers building new energy apps using the Genability APIs and data.
